biotools.summary:
a web tool for the development of quantitative structure-activity relationship models in drug discovery.

The Cloud 3D-QSAR Server is developed to help running 3D-QSAR jobs by submitting molecular structures and pKi values on web pages which is much more convenient than by command line. This server use Open3DQSAR as the QSAR software and Open Babel to process structure stuff.

bioschemas.name: Cloud 3D-QSAR
